name: Labs Still Not Pay Report
query:
SELECT 
    s.name AS "SN:Link/Sales Order:100",
    s.patient AS "Patient:Data:100",
    s.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:250", 
    s.contact_mobile AS "Mobile:Data:100",
    s.ref_practitioner AS "Doctor:Data:200",
    s.delivery_date AS "Date:Data:100",
    s.status AS "Status:Data:140",
    I.item_code AS "Service Name:Data:200", 
    R.section AS "Section:Data:150", 
    I.qty AS "Qty",
    I.rate AS "Amount:Currency"
    
FROM 
    `tabSales Order` s 
JOIN 
    `tabSales Order Item` I ON I.parent = s.name
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabRadiology Template` R ON I.item_code = R.name
WHERE 
    I.delivered_qty < 1
    AND s.transaction_date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s
    AND s.docstatus = 1 
    AND I.item_group IN ("Laboratory")
    and s.status != "Completed"
